about_the_game:
Join "Magiscapes", an AI-driven sandbox adventure world!

You will build your camp from scratch and create your AI companions. The behavior of your companions is entirely driven by AI, so every interaction with them will deepen your shared memories and shape a unique relationship between you.

Welcome to "Magiscapes" to experience the story you weave with your AI companions!

Game Features

Build your camp

In "Magiscapes", you play as a retired hero, starting from scratch to build your camp step by step. By collecting resources, constructing facilities, and developing agriculture, your camp will gradually prosper.

Indispensable adventure journey

Having built your camp and collected equipment, the next step is to pack up and set off on an adventure. The Oz continent is filled with various magical creatures. Defeat them and leave your mark across the entire continent.

One-click recruitment of your AI game companions!

Try recruiting your favorite characters in the game by uploading pictures or entering descriptions. Each AI companion will have a unique appearance and story. Let your imagination run wild, and you might be pleasantly surprised?

AI companions who can talk back

The NPCs in "Magiscapes" are not just background characters. We have introduced AI technology to give life to NPCs. Try interacting with them more!

Unique relationships

Each NPC has their own unique personality and story. By interacting with them, you can develop unique special relationships and experience a rich social life.

About demo version

  • In the demo version, players can experience the Plains Map and the Cave Map.

  • The maps contain four NPCs, and players can recruit one AI NPC.

  • The demo version includes a beginner's process and some early tasks.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X (2GB VRAM) / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750(2GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Magiscapes is a AI sandbox adventure game. Build your camp and an AI companion, forging a unique bond through interactions. (The demo offers Plains and Cave maps with four NPCs and the option to recruit an AI ally. It also features a beginner's guide and initial quests.)
